Package com.karandev.io.util.console

Class Console.Error

java.lang.Object
com.karandev.io.util.console.Console.Error
Enclosing class:
Console
public static final class Console.Error extends Object
Nested class for writing various data types and formatted output to the standard error stream.

Provides static methods to print various data types (primitive types, String, Object), and their bit representations to System.err, with support for formatting and writing newlines.
